import React, { Component } from "react"; import * as routes from "../constants/routes"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import withAuthorization from "./withAuthorization"; import { db } from "../firebase"; class Project4 extends Component { state = { users: null, username: "", loading: true }; componentDidMount() { db.onceGetUsers().then(res => { this.setState({ users: res.val() }); }); const { loggedUser } = this.props; db.doGetAnUnser(loggedUser.uid).then(res => { this.setState({ username: res.val().username, loading: false }); }); } render() { const { users, username, loading } = this.state; // console.log("dasdf", this.props.loggedUser); return (

AstroLabs Final Project + MERN Stack App

Superhero Portal

Superhero Portal is a social networking site for superhero fans. The idea was presented upon the release of Avengers End Game (2019). Images are taken from google.

Visit the Web App
MongoDB, Express, React, Node

MERN stands for MongoDB, Express, React, Node, after the four key technologies that make up the stack. MongoDB - document database. Express(.js) - Node.js web framework. React(.js) - a client-side JavaScript framework. Node(.js) - the premier JavaScript web server.
That Which Is Measured, Improves.

As the world’s leading fair and exhibition company, Messe Frankfurt team invests on skilled event photographers to ensure these corporate events are properly documented and well-represented. These high-quality photos are one of our marketing team’s versatile assets. It is important to generously include these photos in our staff magazine. From an experienced digital designer perspective, I also wanted to give it an overall professional boost — so I replaced the Microsoft Publisher and introduced Adobe InDesign to the team. Team: Gareth Wright (team manager), Prabin Prabakharan (content writer), Kaye So Kua (creative execution)
